name: realtimeshuttletracking
description: Track position of your next transportation

scripts.serve: set NODE_ENV=development && node build/clean.js && standard && parcel build src/index.html && workbox generateSW workbox-config.js && liveserver
scripts.build: node build/clean.js && standard && parcel build src/index.html --no-source-maps --public-url ./ && node build/sw.js

author: Nicolas Guinet
